name: Vegan Stir Fry
description: This easy Vegan Stir Fry is loaded with veggies, soy curl "chicken" and the most amazing stir fry sauce made with soy sauce, agave, ginger, garlic and sesame oil! It's ready in under 30 minutes and the whole family will love it.
recipeIngredient: 1 medium zucchini, sliced and halved or quartered
1  red bell pepper, seeded and chopped into large chunks
1/2 cup vegan no chicken broth (or vegetable broth)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare soy curls: In a large bowl, add the dehydrated soy curls, then cover with about 3 cups of warm water. Let them rehydrate for about 10 minutes until they have grown in size and softened. Drain in a colander and squeeze any excess water from the pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare soy curls: In a large bowl, add the dehydrated soy curls, then cover with about 3 cups of warm water. Let them rehydrate for about 10 minutes until they have grown in size and softened. Drain in a colander and squeeze any excess water from the pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together all the sauce ingredients. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together all the sauce ingredients. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large sauté pan or wok, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil and heat over medium-high heat. Add the soy curls, optional chicken seasoning and stir fry for about 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked soy curls to a plate nearby.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large sauté pan or wok, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil and heat over medium-high heat. Add the soy curls, optional chicken seasoning and stir fry for about 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked soy curls to a plate nearby.

recipeInstructions.text: To the pan, add an additional tablespoon of olive oil, then the onion, zucchini, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms and red bell pepper. Stir often for 2-3 minutes until crisp tender.
recipeInstructions.name: To the pan, add an additional tablespoon of olive oil, then the onion, zucchini, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms and red bell pepper. Stir often for 2-3 minutes until crisp tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for another minute, stirring.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for another minute, stirring.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the soy curls back to the pan. Whisk the stir fry sauce one last time and pour over the soy curls and vegetables. Stir to combine; the sauce will thicken a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the soy curls back to the pan. Whisk the stir fry sauce one last time and pour over the soy curls and vegetables. Stir to combine; the sauce will thicken a bit.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the sauce thickens, remove the pan from heat. Stir in the cashews or peanuts, if using. Serve over rice or noodles with chopped green onions, sesame seeds and hot sauce, if desired. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Once the sauce thickens, remove the pan from heat. Stir in the cashews or peanuts, if using. Serve over rice or noodles with chopped green onions, sesame seeds and hot sauce, if desired. Enjoy!
